title: Date of 2nd round of counselling?
content: When's the second round of counselling? I didnt get any notice yet and ppl are talking about it so now im confused

comments.body: August 1st week I guess
your pessat rank?
Okay

Not until 27th July 

Bcoz date to surrender the seat has been extended till 27th is what I got to know today
Acha thank you !
Also, i didnt attend the first round, am i eligible to attend the 2nd round?
yes
Alright
I went for seat surrender today and the person there said first week of August
which college u r opting for ?
Website shows August. No confirmed dates, but yeah, August.

2nd round of pessat counselling will be held on the immediate weekend after announcement of results of kcet 2nd round counselling, the last date to surrender the seat obtained through pessat first round counselling will also be postponed until announcement of kcet 2nd round counselling results.
MS Ramaiah
They haven't even released 1st round results
Before first round there is a mock round, before that you have to do choice filling

Any rough estimate of dates you got ?? 
I'm gettin a bit anxious
hey any particular reason? as I've heard that rvce>pesu rr> bmsce> msrit
I didn't get any postive reviews about ECE in PESU RR whereas for MSRIT I got positive reviews
oh ok yeah you're right... this order I had heard for cse
